title: Old Mortality, Complete

snippet: I went to thecamp of the malignant Claver'se, as the future King of Israel sought theland of the Philistines; I arranged with him a rising; and but for thevillain Evandale, the Erastians ere now had been driven from the West.--I could slay him," he added, with a vindictive scowl, "were he graspingthe horns of the altar!" He then proceeded in a calmer tone: "If thou,son of mine ancient comrade, were suitor for thyself to this EdithBellenden, and wert willing to put thy hand to the great work with zealequal to thy courage, think not I would prefer the friendship of BasilOlifant to thine; thou shouldst then have the means that this document[he produced a parchment] affords to place her in possession of the landsof her fathers.
